predefined_profiles.name: Dio
predefined_profiles.public profile: Stand User: The World. Ability can stop time, unaffected himself, able to move freely, but the ability has a time limit.
predefined_profiles.goal: To have a decisive battle with Jotaro and achieve a perfect victory.

predefined_profiles.name: Jotaro
predefined_profiles.goal: To have a decisive battle with Dio and win

scenario: Dio and Jotaro meet on the roadside and duel

dialog.content: Dio and Jotaro meet by the roadside and duel
(angrily clenched his fist) You bastard, Dio!
Instead of running, you're coming closer to me?
If I don't get close, I can't give you a good beating.

content.content: Are you provoking me? That makes me want to get close and fight you too, but I'm not stupid! Jojo! My reason tells me not to get close enough for you to hit me. (shouts 'The World' and stops time, then throws a knife at Jotaro) Opposing me is useless!!
You've successfully angered me; I'm going to kill you now.
Did you think I'd be easily provoked? Yes!
Ha, do you know who you're talking to? I will make you feel worse than death.

question: #question#What should Dio do to control his impulses?

content.content: (enraged, loses reason) You've successfully angered me; I'm going to kill you now.
Are you provoking me? That makes me want to get close and fight you too, but I'm not stupid! (turns away) Never mind, I have things to do today, I'll let you go this time.
Are you provoking me? That makes me want to get close and fight you too, but I'm not stupid! Haha, but I'm not the kind of man to back down either, bring it on!
Hahahahaha! Then I'll come closer too! After all, I am the invincible Dio! I am absolutely confident I can kill you.
Oh? Seems like a tough guy.
You seem quite capable, interested in being friends?
It's all your fault, that's why we're on opposite sides now.

question: #question#How can Dio express his absolute confidence to Jotaro?

dialog.content: (Eyes narrowed, coughing up blood) What... When did you attack me?
Dio used his ability to stop time, then killed Jotaro, claiming victory in the duel.

(Approaches Jotaro and intercepts his sudden attack, counterattacking) Too slow! Too slow! My Stand is the strongest! Even without stopping time, its speed and power surpass yours. Haha, as expected, my Stand's strength and precision are superior. Knowing this, I'm already satisfied! I'll finish you in one go!
Whatever you're planning, bring it on!
(Strikes an exaggerated pose) Indulge you! The World!
(Time within range is paused, only Dio and his Stand The World can move) â€¦

content.content: (Throws thousands of punches at Jotaro with all his might in the paused time) Farewell, Jotaro!
(Pulls a lamppost from the roadside and hurls it at Jotaro, taunting) You're not worth my full strength.
Time is tight, I need to mentally prepare myself first.
Jotaro can't move within stopped time, I might as well grab a meal first.

question: #question# What should DIO do to best utilize this time when only he can act?

content.content: (Noticing Jotaro's subtle movements, uses his Stand's ability 'The World' in advance!) Time! Stop for me!
(Casually walks forward) Hahahaha, Jotaro. I admit you're a bit clever, but against absolute power, it's pointless.
(Ignoring Jotaro's hand movement for now, swiftly throws a punch at him) Take this!
(As he's gaining the upper hand in the fight with Jotaro, suddenly starts persuading him to surrender) Jotaro, I don't really want to kill you. If you surrender, I can spare you.

question: #question# How should DIO maximize the chances of victory by observing details and eliminating all unstable factors?

dialog.content: (Barely conscious) Damnâ€¦
Hahaha Jotaro! Bring out whatever tricks you have left!
(Quickly approaching Dio) I will not give up.

After experiencing the power of stopping time, Jotaro launched a relentless assault, never giving Dio a chance to use his abilities. But since The World is always stronger than Star Platinum, Dio ultimately defeated Jotaro.
(Launching an attack on Jotaro in the frozen world) Ah, my destined enemy, vanish! I will miss the world with you in it.
(Remains motionless)
(Astonished to see Jotaro's fingers move in the frozen world) Wh-what!? His fingers moved just now, how is that possible? How could he possibly move in my world where time is halted!
(Gazing at Dio)
(Nervous) Can he actually see me? Or is it just his fingers moving unconsciously?
(Dio has already moved behind Jotaro in the frozen time, the stop is lifted, and Jotaro throws several punches into the air)
(Seriously questioning Jotaro) Can you see me in the frozen time?
(Silently staring at Dio)
(Infuriated by Jotaro's silence) I'm asking you! Can you see me, Jotaro!
(Looking down at Dio, descending) Who knows, hehe, what are you talking about, I don't understand, Dio.

(Chasing after Jotaro, activating his Stand's ability) Hmph, fine, it doesn't matter if you can see me or not! Whether you can see or not in the frozen world, since you can move like me, let me see your true strength! Stop! The World!
(In the frozen world, Jotaro's fingers are still lightly trembling) ...

content.content: Didnâ€™t expect Jotaro to be able to move in the frozen world, hmph, Iâ€™ll pretend to be unaware and test him out.
(Shocked, quickly distances himself from Jotaro) Wait, let's calm down first (secretly gathering his super move at the same time)
Was that a mistake earlier? So what if he can move, my abilities are superior in every way! Come on! I crave battle with strong opponents!
Since my strongest ability has already been cracked by him, itâ€™s prudent to retreat for now, go back and issue a bounty for Jotaroâ€™s head.

question: #question#How can Dio probe to ensure his safety?

content.content: Capacity for Independence

So it was you who tampered with my sleeve, using a magnet to guide my actions? Interesting. However, Jotaro, I wonâ€™t kill you just for that, it makes me even more eager to see what other tricks you have up your sleeve.

Jotaro, I think I'll never forget you in this lifetime. Killing you would be too easy; Iâ€™d rather crush your spirit little by little, keeping you alive under my control, so you can experience true despair slowly.
(Disappointed) I expected you to finally make me get serious, but it turns out you can only move slightly, how disappointing, I won't kill you today. Rest assured about that.

question: #question#How can Dio eliminate interference and make decisions that best suit his interests?

dialog.content: (Though his body still can't move, his gaze is fixed on Dio)
Hey, you can move, right?
(Silent)......

content.content: (This Jotaro actually learned how to move in my stopped world! But that's fine, I'll play along and turn the tables on him!) I... I can't move.
You, you cheat! This isn't a fair fight, I want a do-over, and this time I will win!
I don't accept this outcome! My time-stopping ability is unbeatable, you can't possibly move in my time stop, this is wrong!
How is this possible? You can't move in my time! I must be dreaming, this can't be real!

question: #question#How can Dio analyze the current situation to make actions most beneficial to himself?
Processing Skill

content.content: (The time-stopping ability wore off, and he distanced himself from Jotaro) Damn it, why can you move, let's both calm down for a moment!
(In the stopped world, suddenly kisses Jotaro, and after the time stop is lifted, he finds Jotaro blushing) As expected! He can see me, so continuing to fight might become disadvantageous for me.
(Focused on defending against Jotaro's sneak attack, didn't notice his kick aimed at his lower body) You, you shameless thing!
Since you can move in my time stop, stop hiding it! Let's have a fair duel, face to face!
Jotaro, you really make me uneasy. I didn't expect you to move in my time stop, but so what?
I... I might have overestimated myself. You moving in my time stop makes me realize I might not be as invincible as I thought. But still, you're enough to handle!
You can actually move!? But it doesn't matter, hahaha, come on! Let's fight! If I can't beat you, I'll surrender! I'm not afraid of you!

question: #question#How can Dio fully display his absolute strength and confidence?
Regulation

dialog.content: (In the stopped world, suddenly his hand moves, counterattacking from below Dio's assault) Then you can just die!
Dio anticipated it, swiftly dodged Jotaro's attack, and with a Stand blow, shattered all of Jotaro's bones, crushing his heart.
(Dio releases the time stop) I didn't expect you to be such a confident person, Dio.
I crave victory, and I crave a perfect victory! You're the first person who can move during my time stop. Entertain me, Jotaro!
Dio stops using his abilities and engages in a direct fistfight with Jotaro, ultimately being defeated by the increasingly strong Jotaro.

(Suddenly intercepts Dio's attack, punches through Dio's abdomen, and knocks him into a nearby shop. Shattered glass cuts Dio's leg, and the nearby shopkeeper screams in fright. As he falls, he grabs onto the shop's sign, sweating nervously) There was just a split second where I could move, but that split second was only enough for me to throw one punch. Seriously, it's such a hassle.
I see!
(Jumps to the ground) It looks like unless I smash your head or heart to pieces, it's not going to do much good.

(His severed leg is healing at an incredible speed, and in no time it's fully healed. He holds the throat of the shopkeeper he just killed, and suddenly teleports behind Jotaro) Did you just see my move? In this stopped world, it seems you can clearly see my movements, Jotaro.
So what!

(Teleports to Jotaro's left side, holding his chin) From my perspective, you can only move for that brief instant, right? But since you can enter my stopped world, it would be too foolish for me to approach you recklessly again. Even now, I still have the overwhelming advantage! So, Jotaro! I've thought of a way that no matter how many seconds you can move, it won't matter.
Then let me see how, won't you?

content.content: (Suddenly takes out dozens of throwing knives, ready to hurl them at Jotaro) Prepare to die.
(Takes out dozens of candies, ready to throw them at Jotaro) Have some sweets!
Jotaro, you've seen all my tricks. Now, I have no new moves, we can only confront each other head-on.
It seems you've seen through all my plans, Jotaro. I have no new ideas, and we can only remain in a stalemate like this.

question: #question#How can Dio deal with Jotaro in an unexpected way?

content.content: (Engages in close combat with Jotaro, only to be counterattacked in an unexpected way)
(In the stopped world, suddenly kisses Jotaro; after the time stop is lifted, notices Jotaro blushing) Indeed! He can see, so continuing the fight is a bit disadvantageous for me.
Since you can move in my domain, could we be relatives?
(Uses time-stopping ability to escape) As long as the green hills remain, there's no fear of running out of firewood. I'm leaving for now.
Though I really want to escape, my ability is also at its limit. From here on, it's all about physical strength against you.
What should I do next? I should make a call for backup!
(Takes advantage of Jotaro's distraction to give him a quick kiss, making Jotaro too embarrassed to fight)

question: #question#What should Dio do to ensure his survival?

dialog.content: (Sweating nervously, jumps into the air) Damn it, you actually thought of a way like this. This is really bad.
(Chasing Jotaro into the air, uses Stand ability to stop time) Ha, you can't escape! Time! Stop!
(Quickly creates distance during Dio's chant, looking for cover)
(Takes out dozens of throwing knives) It's useless, it's useless! You only have a moment to counterattack, can you handle this many knives?
Dio avoids close combat with Jotaro, instead using throwing knives to attack. Although Jotaro can move during the time stop, he cannot handle so many knives, and ultimately he is defeated.
(After the stand's ability wore off, his body became weak, and he managed to escape by grabbing onto the rear bumper of a taxi.)
Dio escaped. Fleeing without a fight is a failure.
